en: Runs around, drops a crate on death
zh: 四处奔跑, 死亡时掉落一个箱子

en: Slowly chase the player\nEvolve when 10 non-slime enemies die within a range of 100
zh: 缓慢追击玩家\n100范围内死亡的非史莱姆系敌人达到10个则进化

en:
Slowly chase the player
Summon 1 small slime per second
Upon death, split into 3 small slimes
Evolve when 24 non-slime enemies die within a range of 200
zh:
缓慢追击玩家
每秒召唤1个小史莱姆
死亡时分裂成3个小史莱姆
200范围内死亡的非史莱姆系敌人达到24个则进化

en:
Slowly chase the player
Summon 3 small slimes per second
Upon death, split into 2 medium slimes
Evolve when 48 non-slime enemies die within a range of 400
Leave a slime trail every 1 second that lasts for 5 seconds, players touching it are slowed by 50%
zh:
缓慢追击玩家
每秒召唤3个小史莱姆
死亡时分裂成2个中史莱姆
400范围内死亡的非史莱姆系敌人达到48个则进化
每秒留下持续5秒的史莱姆粘液痕迹, 玩家触碰时被减速50%

en:
Mutation 0:
Slowly chase the player
Summon 3 medium slimes every 3 seconds and 1 large slime every 5 seconds
Leave a slime trail every 0.5 seconds that lasts for 10 seconds, players touching it are slowed by 50%

Mutation 1 (50% HP / 35 sec):
Perform a long-range dash toward the player every 5 seconds
Summon 4 large slimes at once
Summon 3 medium slimes every 3 seconds and 1 large slime every 5 seconds
Leave a slime trail every 0.5 seconds that lasts for 10 seconds, players touching it are slowed by 50%
zh:
异变0: 
缓慢追击玩家
每3秒召唤3个中史莱姆, 每5秒召唤1个大史莱姆
每0.5秒留下持续10秒的史莱姆粘液痕迹, 玩家触碰时被减速50%

异变1 (50%生命/35秒): 
每5秒向玩家长距离冲刺
一次性召唤4个大史莱姆
每3秒召唤3个中史莱姆, 每5秒召唤1个大史莱姆
每0.5秒留下持续10秒的史莱姆粘液痕迹, 玩家触碰时被减速50%

en: Chases the character, deals damage on touch
zh: 追逐角色, 接触时造成伤害

en: Chases the character, dashes toward them every 0.75 seconds
zh: 追逐角色, 每0.75秒向角色冲刺

en: Cannot move, fires a laser toward the player every 4 seconds with a 1-second warning
zh: 无法移动, 每4秒朝玩家方向发射拥有1秒预警的激光

en: Winds forward toward the character, dashing toward them every second
zh: 蜿蜒前行靠近角色, 每秒向角色冲刺

en: Hunt the character, charging toward them rapidly every 0.5 seconds
zh: 围猎角色, 每0.5秒快速冲向角色

en: Runs away if the player is too close, Fires a slow projectile that may directly target the player or somewhere near
zh: 太接近时逃离角色, 发射一个可能瞄准玩家也可能瞄准玩家附近的缓慢投射物

en: Runs away from the character, Heals enemies around it for 50(increasing by 5 each wave), Buffs other enemies' health by 75%, damage by 12%, and speed by 25%.Buffed enemies are outlined in red.
zh: 逃离角色, 治疗周围的敌人50生命(每波敌袭增加5), 强化其他敌人生命值75%、伤害12%、速度25%，被强化的敌人会有红色轮廓

en: Cannot move, every 4 seconds, fires a winding bullet cluster consisting of 24 bullets toward the player.
zh: 无法移动, 每4秒朝玩家方向发射一个由24个子弹构成的蜿蜒子弹群

en: Chases the player, briefly pauses before attacking, and attempts to slash nearby players once per second.
zh: 追击玩家, 每秒试图挥砍周围的玩家, 攻击前会短暂静止

en: Chases the player and fires an arrow toward them every 3 seconds. This arrow summons smaller arrows on both perpendicular sides, which automatically disappear after 1.5 seconds.
zh: 追击玩家, 每3秒朝玩家发射箭矢, 该箭矢可在两侧垂直方向召唤召唤1.5秒后自动消失的小箭矢
